sprint_goal: Establish the foundational user lifecycle: Admin registration, basic user login with password policy, and role-based routing.
Implement the core Subordinate workflow for attendance marking, including check-in/out, permissions, button state management, and basic offline support.
Build the complete user invitation and registration flow, from Admin invitation to user activation, including handling expired links and policy acceptance.
Implement the core Supervisor approval workflow, including viewing pending records, approving/rejecting single items, and identifying flagged records.
